I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Government, Law & Policy at Arkansas State University. 

My research interests lie at the intersection of economic development, representation, and comparative public policy. 

My work has been published in the *Journal of Politics*, *Political Behavior*, and *Social Science Quarterly*.
